CheckTitle: Bot Fight Mode is enabled to detect and mitigate automated bot traffic
Description: Verifies that Bot Fight Mode (Browser Integrity Check) is enabled to detect and mitigate automated bot traffic targeting the zone.
Risk: Without Bot Fight Mode, zones are vulnerable to automated attacks including web scraping, credential stuffing, inventory hoarding, and other bot-driven threats that can compromise data integrity and availability.

Recommendation.Text: Enable Bot Fight Mode as part of a layered bot management strategy. Combine with rate limiting and WAF rules for comprehensive protection against automated threats while minimizing impact on legitimate users.
